content: around 28r of 12 ears make 2 - one in mc one in cc 1 4sc into magic_ring 2 increase single_crochet around 6 3 increase single_crochet around 9 4 increase single_crochet x2 around 12 5 increase single_crochet x3 around 15 6 increase single_crochet 4 around 18 7-8 single_crochet around 2r of 18 9 decrease single_crochet 4 around 15 slip_stitch into next st f o leave long tail for sewing i find it easier to add stitch lines before sewing parts together with floss/thread - sew eye patch on to one side of face with big visible stitches sew a big x in place of the second eye sew button to center of the eye patch stitch on a triangle shape for nose one round below the eyes and a mouth under the nose make a stitch line down the center of the head from just above the nose up between eyes front and back of head add a couple of x s over mouth if you made it wide enough add a stitch line down the center of the belly add stitch lines down the length of the arms & legs & big visible stitches around the paws where the two colors meet add stitch lines around the edges of the ears add a stitch line to tail - either a straight one down the tail one that just circles the tail near the tip or one that curves around the length of the tail ultimately the stitch placement is up to you add them wherever you like what looks good to you these are just suggestions based on where or how i added them assembly - sew arms to sides of body just below the neck at a slight angle forward sew legs to bottom/front on each side of the belly stitch line with bottoms at or near round 38-39 sew ears to top sides of head with about 4-6 stitches between them sew tail to butt with bottom at or near round 38-39 cut heart shape out of felt or fabric and sew to chest with floss
